result.title: Testing Round
result.content:
Hey All,

Testing round will be held on Wednesday, February 11 at 21:00, you can find it in the contests tab, don't forget to register before the round starts.

This round is NOT rated.. it's just to get you introduced to the system.

Some problem statements will be attached as a PDF file.

Some problems may need reading/writing input/output from/to files, to do so use the following code. "file_name.X" may differ from problem to another where 'X' is the file extension.

C/C++

int main () {
	freopen ("file_name.X", "r", stdin);
	freopen ("file_name.X","w",stdout);
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}

Java

public static void main(String[] args) {
	BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("file_name.X"));
	PrintWriter out = new PrintWriter("file_name.X");
	// your code goes here
	br.close();
	out.close();
}

Feel free to ask questions if you have any..

Good luck!
